data.name: Detached Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Detached Original Soundtrack
Immerse yourself in a lonely, challenging, and endless journey in space. Includes a selection of tracks hand picked, composed, and produced by Mikolai Stroinski - a respected and well-known composer responsible for the music for The Witcher 3 and Age of Empire 4.
